task.title: How can I show the time and date in text chats?
task.shortdesc: You can show the time and date of each message you and your chat partner send to each other during a single chat or for all your chats.

taskbody.context:
Do one or both of the following tasks:
To show the time and date of the text that is sent and received in a single, open chat window, in the chat window, click Actions and preferences ViewTimestamps and Actions and preferences ViewDatestamps . Clear these options if you do not want to show the time or date in the text message.
To show the time and date of the text that is sent and received for all chats, do one of the following actions, depending on the client you are using:
Options
If you are using: Do this:
HCL Sametime Connect
Click Actions and preferences Preferences . Then, click Chat Window and Transcript in the navigator and select Timestamps and specify an hour display format. Then, select Datestamps, click Apply, and then click OK.
HCL Notes
Click Actions and preferences Preferences . Then, expand the Sametime section in the navigator. Click Chat Window and Transcript, and select Timestamps and specify an hour display format. Then, select Datestamps, click Apply, and then click OK.
